tweets.author_name: Derek Kompare will return in DIAMONDS ARE FOREVER
tweets.html:

BREAKING: NBC to reunite cast of Seinfeld, based on this one rumor I heard from my accountant's brother's college roommate's hairdresser.

The #VeronicaMars Kickstarter money might pay for new a #Friends...food truck service contract. So start there, I guess.

IDEA: NBC reunites cast of FRIENDS, each playing a different character from post-FRIENDS career. Schwimmer animated as Melman.

@poniewozik LeBlanc plays himself, believing he's entered a terrifying alternate universe with Kudrow as his web therapist.

haha can you imagine how incredibly depressing a Friends reunion would be

tweets.author_name: MMorse Has Ambled Off Fer Awhile
tweets.html:
S: "Dad?"
D: "Yes, son?"
S: "What happens when we die?"
D: "Son, fetch me my copy of 'Ghost Dad' starring Bill Cosby. It's time we talked."

— MMorse Has Ambled Off Fer Awhile (@M_Morse) April 17, 2013

I eat a lot of spinach but Bluto would totally kick my ass. So, yeah, I'm calling bullshit on Popeye. Who's probably not even a real sailor.

Studies have found that watching reruns of your favorite TV show can help restore your self-control and willpower.
